post:
Stop the Presses! NexusBytes Launches a New Budget Line: EntryBytes!

entrybytes, los angeles, miami, netherlands, new york, nexusbytes, NYC April 2, 2021 @ 12:00 am, by raindog308

NexusBytes needs no introduction here.  They won the silver award in our 2020 Provider Awards and we interviewed their CEO last year.  Their offers on LowEndTalk are always sprinkled with wit and great value for the community.

Now they’re offering a new budget line: EntryBytes!

Here’s a little bit about EntryBytes from NexusBytes‘ CEO, Jay:

“Affordable does not necessarily mean “cheap” and shouldn’t sacrifice stability :)

Reliable, no-frills VPS that still get the job done. For those on a budget but are not willing to compromise on the basics, our Entry level VPS range offers the best value for money. Powered by the loving NexusCare team!

Here at Nexus Bytes LLC, we don’t have customers, we have family members. We strive and take pride in providing the best service and experience possible. Don’t wait and join the Nexus Bytes Family today to find out why we are awesome!

Here at Nexus Bytes, we do things differently. You are not just a customer or another line in our CRM database. You are part of the Nexus Bytes family and we only want the best for our family. We are not going to sell our family members what we won’t buy for ourselves. That’s the Nexus Bytes difference.

We are not here to sell you services, we are here to earn your business :)”

Awesome!  And even more awesome,

  • there are some additional discount codes below!
  • free DirectAdmin standard license included!
  • free Blesta license included!
  • Windows Server (2012/2019) standard for a $10 one-time setup fee!

The EntryBytes lineup is available in the Netherlands, New York, or Los Angeles.

Their WHOIS is public. They are registered in Connecticut, USA (1216352). Their Terms of Service is available on their web site. They accept Debit/Credit cards, PayPal, AliPay, WeChatPay, OXXO Mexico, Boleto Brazil, WebMoney, India NetBanking, Paytm, Bitcoin/Bitcoin Cash/LiteCoin/Ethereum.

The LEB community thrives on reports from our readers about the companies they patronize, so please comment below about your experience with EntryBytes.

So as NexusBytes might put it…what are you waiting for? Come take a Byte and join the Family today!

Now read more to see the offers!

EntryBytes Special Offer

Get 15% off for life with the coupon code ThisIsNotAJoke on all entry/intermediate plans!
